centerName: BRIDGE STREET YOUTH CONNECTION SUMMER PROGRAM

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept
Camp fails to carry non-owner policy for all transportation units used but not owned by the camp
Camps fail to provide DOHMH with name address phone number of insurance company fail to provide amount of coverage
